Mayor & City Council
====================

![IMG_8473](https://www.libertyhilltx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=3402)

City Council meetings are the second and fourth Wednesday of each month at 6:00 pm at Council Chambers/Municipal Court at 2801 Ranch Road 1869 in Liberty Hill. Meetings can be viewed live online via a link that will be posted to the
[City's Facebook page](https://www.facebook.com/CityofLibertyHill/)
just prior to the start of each meeting.

Mayor
=====

![_WMP8380-Edit](https://www.libertyhilltx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=1718)

Mayor Crystal Mancilla
----------------------

Mayor
[Email](mailto:cmancilla@libertyhilltx.gov)
Term expires May 2028
